properties.name: Sheridan's Frozen Custard
properties.description: Posted by Shannonor10385 S Eastern Ave, Henderson, NV 89052Phone: (702) 558-3344 from Chowhound: Sheridan\'s Frozen Custard is the closest you\'ll get to REAL frozen custard in southern Nevada. They use the extremely expensive Ross freezers that don\'t whip air into the mix. It\'s still not as good as Andy\'s or Ted Drewe\'s, but it\'s close enough to work.
